page.index.title: Home
page.index.description: I'm Creeperkatze, a Unity game developer from Germany, with my current big project being Superslide. Currently also stumbling into web development.
page.index.welcome:
A Unity game developer from Germany, with my current big project being Superslide.
Here on my website, you will find information about me, exciting puzzles, and cat pictures.

page.idiot_test.title: Idiot Test - How smart are you really?
page.idiot_test.description: Test whether you're an idiot with these crazy and tricky questions!
page.idiot_test.heading: Idiot Test
page.idiot_test.text:
Have you ever wondered whether you're an idiot? Then you've come to the right place!
Answer all 25 questions in this online idiot test to get your result! 
But beware: not all solutions are as simple as they may seem.
page.idiot_test.rank.description.0: You somehow managed to answer hardly any questions correctly...
page.idiot_test.rank.description.1: Well... You're not an idiot, but you can do better!
page.idiot_test.rank.description.2: Not bad at all! A pretty... average score.
page.idiot_test.rank.description.3: Ok, ok, not bad... But you're still not a genius.
page.idiot_test.rank.description.4: You answered ALL questions correctly... Respect!
page.idiot_test.share.title: Idiot Test - How smart are you really?
page.idiot_test.share.text:
ðŸ”¥I am a: %rank%, with %score% of %questionsLength% questions correct!

ðŸ«µTry this idiot test and find out whether you're an idiot or a genius after all!
page.christmas-quiz.title: Christmas Quiz - Test your knowledge
page.christmas-quiz.description: The ultimate Christmas Quiz! Test your knowledge of the history, traditions and fun facts about the most wonderful holiday of the year!
page.christmas-quiz.heading: Christmas Quiz
page.christmas-quiz.text: Are you a true Christmas expert or more of an amateur? In this entertaining online Christmas Quiz, you can expect 25 exciting questions about the history, traditions and fun facts about the most beautiful holiday of the year. Test your knowledge, find the right answers and receive your result including your rank!
page.christmas-quiz.rank.description.0: You are a servant! Not even a reindeer. There's still a lot of room for improvement...
page.christmas-quiz.rank.description.1: Well... At least you get to pull the sleigh!
page.christmas-quiz.rank.description.2: Not bad at all! At least you're an imp... Hard-working, but not in the spotlight yet.
page.christmas-quiz.rank.description.3: Ok, ok, not bad... You are an angel. A heavenly, almost perfect, performance!
page.christmas-quiz.rank.description.4: You answered ALL questions correctly... Respect! You are the Christmas star, and perfectly prepared for the festive season!
page.christmas-quiz.share.title: Christmas Quiz - Test your knowledge
page.christmas-quiz.share.text:
ðŸŽ„I am a: %rank%, with %score% of %questionsLength% questions correct!

ðŸ«µTry out this Christmas quiz and find out if you are a true Christmas expert!
page.common-knowledge-quiz.title: Common Knowledge Quiz - Test Your Knowledge
page.common-knowledge-quiz.description: A common knowledge quiz with 25 questions from various categories. Test your knowledge and receive your result including rank!
page.common-knowledge-quiz.heading: Common Knowledge Quiz
page.common-knowledge-quiz.text: Are you a knowledge pro or more of a guesser? In this common knowledge quiz, you can expect 25 questions from different areas. Answer the questions, collect points, and receive your rank at the end!
page.common-knowledge-quiz.rank.descript: You are more Albert Backstein than Albert Einstein... And that joke doesnt even work since this is in English...
Well... You know a little, but there's still room for improvement!
Solid... You know quite a bit already.
Strong! You know a lot - respect!
It doesn't get any better! Are you Albert Einstein?

page.new-year-quiz.title: New Year Quiz - Start the year with 25 questions
page.new-year-quiz.description: A New Year quiz with 25 questions about traditions, calendars and fun facts. Test your knowledge and get your rank!
page.new-year-quiz.heading: New Year Quiz
page.new-year-quiz.text: Ready for a fresh start? In this New Year quiz, you get 25 questions about the New Year, calendars, traditions and common fun facts. Answer the questions, score points, and receive your rank at the end!
page.new-year-quiz.rank.description.0: Pop... was that it? You're harmless, but we need a bit more spark than that!
page.new-year-quiz.rank.description.1: As long as your glass is full, right? You clearly only paid attention to half the quiz.
page.new-year-quiz.rank.description.2: A quick fizz and a bit of confetti, but there's definitely room for more!
page.new-year-quiz.rank.description.3: Respect! You're really making a bang.
page.new-year-quiz.rank.description.4: Absolute Cinema! You crushed this quiz. The New Year is yours!
